alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Cleburne; Fayette; Jefferson; Lamar; St. Clair; Walker (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued October 17 at 10:53AM CDT until October 19 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 9 AM CDT TUESDAY... ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TUESDAY NIGHT THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 29 expected. For the Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 24 possible. * WHERE...Lamar, Fayette, Walker, Calhoun, Cleburne, Jefferson and St. Clair Counties. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, from 2 AM to 9 AM CDT Tuesday. For the Freeze Watch, from late Tuesday night through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Cleburne; Fayette; Jefferson; Lamar; St. Clair; Walker
